welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Azuqueca de Henares! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Azuqueca has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for international flights, including some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul and non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but the network may be slow during peak hours.
